caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI'I, Petitioner-Appellant, v. JASON B. RUMBAWA, ROSALINO B.
RAMOS, and ANTHONY BROWN, Respondents-Appellees, and MICAH KANAHELE and

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CR. NO. 03-1-2501)
opinion.attorneys:
James M. Anderson, Deputy Prosecuting Attorney, for petitioner-appellant, on the application.
Karen T. Nakasone, Deputy Public Defender, for respondent-appellee, Ramos, in opposition.
Jeffrey A. Hawk (of Hawk Sing Ignacio), for respondent-appellee Brown, joining Ramos in opposition.
Arthur E. Ross, respondent-appellee Rumbawa, joining Ramos in opposition.

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: MOON, C.J., for the court[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Levinson, Nakayama, Acoba, and Duffy, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Petitioner-appellant State of Hawaii's application for writ of certiorari, filed December 17, 2007, is hereby rejected.Page 1
